ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Five: A Better Tomorrow
ComicInfo.Summary:
After the tragic events of last issue, Anthony “Smash Brannagan” Zane lies in a coma at the edge of death, while a friend from his past threatens to expose the Shadow Cabinet to the world, putting her in the crosshairs of the Infinite Seven! The status quo has changed, making this the PERFECT jump on point for new readers!
Featuring an artist variant cover by series creator, Dave Dwonch!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover A | Arturo Mesa | 1 | B | Movie Poster Variant Cover B, Limited to 1500 | Arturo Mesa | 2 | C | Artist Variant Cover C, Limited to 1500 | Dave Dwonch | 3 | D | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | ? | 4 | Note: The digital edition (7/12/2017) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 15:59:06. [CVDB608150]
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Cinco, Anthony Zane, Lars Wolfsberg, Laughing Skull, Lord Ellington, Master Zhen, Sherlock Moriarty, Washington
